Detailed Description

3D render class.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

~Render3D (   ) 
 

Destructor.

Unlock the screen video memory and frees entire memory occupied under the 3d graphics render.

Member Function Documentation

void AddLight (  ObjRef< Light >  light  ) 
 

Adds new light source to scene.

Parameters:
light - pointer Light object.

Bool CheckMode (  Int  mode  ) 
 

Checks one render mode.

Parameters:
mode - mode to check. See Render_XXXXX_Mode defines for details.
Returns:
Returns True if mode set else False.

void Clear (  Int  type  ) 
 

Performs clearing of color, depth or stencil backbuffer.

Only part of backbuffer defined by last call of SetViewport() will be cleaned. Call Clear() at the beginning of new frame drawing.

Parameters:
type - see Render_ClearType_ClearXXXXX defines for more info.

void ClearMode (  Int  mode  ) 
 

Clears one render mode.

Parameters:
mode - mode to clear. See Render_XXXXX_Mode defines for details.

void ComputeLightColor (  ObjRef< VertexBuffer >  vb  ) 
 

Computes vertex colors for drawing specified VertexBuffer object.

SetLight() need to call first before this function. Also after ComputeLightColor() should be call Draw() to send specified vertex buffer geometry with light colors to draw queue.

Parameters:
vb - pointer to specified VertexBuffer object for lighting.

void Draw (  ObjRef< Sprite3D >  sprite_  ) 
 

Sends Sprite3D object to the draw queue.

Parameters:
sprite_ - pointer to the Sprite3D class object.

void Draw (  ObjRef< VertexBuffer >  vb_base,
ObjRef< VertexBuffer >  vb_0,
ObjRef< VertexBuffer >  vb_1,
Fixed  li,
Int  object3d_clip
) 
 

Performs morphing one vertex buffer to another.

Performs morphing one vertex buffer to another using base vertex buffer for getting all need components not present in morphing vertex buffer and send result vertex buffer geometry to draw queue.

Parameters:
vb_base - pointer to base VertexBuffer object.
vb_0 - pointer to start VertexBuffer object.
vb_1 - pointer to end VertexBuffer object.
li - morphing interpolation value from 0 to 1 in Fixed.
object3d_clip - clipping flags for VertexBuffer object returned by IsVisible().

void Draw (  ObjRef< VertexBuffer >  vb,
Int  object3d_clip
) 
 

Sends vertex buffer geometry to draw queue.

Parameters:
vb - pointer to VertexBuffer object.
object3d_clip - cliping flags for VertexBuffer object returned by IsVisible().

void DrawLineList (  Vector3fx *  v0,
Vector3fx *  v1,
Int *  color,
Int  count
) 
 

Sends line list to draw queue.

Parameters:
v0 - pointer to Vector3fx line start points array.
v1 - pointer to Vector3fx line end points array.
color - pointer to lines color array.
count - number of lines to draw.

void DrawPointList (  Vector3fx *  v3,
Int *  color,
Int  count
) 
 

Sends point list to draw queue.

Parameters:
v3 - pointer to Vector3fx points array.
color - pointer to points color array.
count - number of points to draw.

ObjRef<LightMap> FindLightMap (  const Char *  name_,
Int  type_
) 
 

Finds specified light map by ASCII name.

Parameters:
name_ - pointer to ASCII name for specified light map.
type_ - light map type.See class LightMap.
Returns:
Returns pointer to LightMap class object if find complete successfully else NULL pointer.

ObjRef<Texture> FindTexture (  const Char *  name_  ) 
 

Finds specified texture by ASCII name in texture queue.

Parameters:
name_ - pointer to ASCII name for specified texture.
Returns:
Returns pointer to Texture class object if find complete successfully else NULL pointer.

void Flush (   ) 
 

Flushes all draw queue for drawing. After drawing clear draw queue.

You can call Flush() several times per one frame as for example first draw all background and flush it to backbuffer and than draw foreground scene on it.

Bool Init (  System *  system_,
Int  width,
Int  height,
Int  bpp,
Int  redbits,
Int  greenbits,
Int  bluebits
) 
 

Performs the complete initialization of Render3D.

This function must be called at the beginning of the initialization of program before any operations with 3d drawing.

Parameters:
system_ System class object pointer.
width The specified width dimension of display.
height The specified height dimension of display.
bpp The specified bit per pixel dimension of display.
redbits The specified red bits per pixel.
greenbits The specified green bits per pixel.
bluebits The specified blue bits per pixel.
See also:
System class for more info about System.
Returns:
Returns True if Render3D init complete successfully else False.

Int IsVisible (  Vector3fx &  pos,
Fixed  radius
) 
 

Checks and return sphere visibility by current camera view frustum.

Parameters:
pos - define sphere position in model coordinate. Will be updated by world matrix.
radius - define sphere radius.
Returns:
Returns non zero value if sphere located in current camera view frustum or have intersection with it. See Render_XXXXX_Plane defines for more info.

ObjRef<LightMap> LoadLightMap (  const Char *  name_,
Int  type_
) 
 

Finds specified light map by ASCII name and if not found than load it from resource.

Parameters:
name_ - pointer to ASCII name for specified light map.
type_ - light map type.See class LightMap.
Returns:
Returns pointer to LightMap class object if find or load complete successfully else NULL pointer.

Bool LoadLODSettings (  vector< ObjRef< Actor3DAnimation > > &  lod_list_,
const Char *  file_name_
) 
 

Loads and apply LOD settings for Actor3DAnimation objects list.

lod_list_ - list of Actor3DAnimation objects lists with different LODs.

Parameters:
file_name_ - name of file of LOD settings.
Returns:
Returns True, if loading success, else - False .

Bool LoadLODSettings (  vector< vector< ObjRef< Basic3D > > > &  lod_list_,
const Char *  file_name_
) 
 

Loads and apply LOD settings for objects delivered from Object3D class.

lod_list_ - lists of objects with different LODs.

Parameters:
file_name_ - name of file of LOD settings.
Returns:
Returns True, if loading success, else - False .

ObjRef<Texture> LoadTexture (  const Char *  name_  ) 
 

Finds specified texture by ASCII name in texture queue and if not found than load it from resource.

Parameters:
name_ - pointer to ASCII name for specified texture. Do not add file extension to this name.
Returns:
Returns pointer to Texture class object if find or load complete successfully else NULL pointer. Also increase found Texture class object reference count by one. See Texture class for more info about supported texture.

Bool LoadTextureAnimation (  vector< ObjRef< TextureAnimation > > &  ta_list_,
const Char *  file_name_
) 
 

Loads texture animations from texture animation settings file.

This function reads the file of texture animation settings and creates new TextureAnimation objects. It stores them to the given list.

Parameters:
ta_list_ - list of texture animation objects to store loaded animations.
file_name_ - name of texture animation settings file.
Returns:
Returns True, if load successful, else - False.

void RemoveLight (  ObjRef< Light >  light  ) 
 

Removes light source from scene.

Parameters:
light - pointer Light object.

ObjRef<VertexBuffer> SelectLODVB (  ObjRef< VertexBuffer >  base_vb_  ) 
 

Selects LOD VB for drawing by using position of camera.

Set correct World matrix before you call this function It's used to calculate center of VB in the world coordinates.

Parameters:
base_vb_ - pointer to High LOD VB (Base VB).
Returns:
Returns pointer to the selected VB.

void SetAmbientLight (  Color  ambient  ) 
 

Sets ambient light color.

Parameters:
ambient - color value. See class Color.

void SetCamera (  Camera *  camera_  ) 
 

Set camera.

Render3D need camera access to select LOD levels.

Parameters:
camera_ - pointer to the Camera class object.

Defines clear color for Clear().

Parameters:
color - clear color value. See class Color.

Defines clear depth for Clear().

Parameters:
depth - clear depth value.

void SetPerspective (  Fixed  fovy,
Fixed  aspect,
Fixed  zNear,
Fixed  zFar
) 
 

Sets perspective matrix for current viewport.

Parameters:
fovy - field of view in radians.
aspect - value.
zNear - distance to near view plane.
zFar - distance to far view plane.

void SetTextureMatrix (  Matrix4fx *  t  ) 
 

Sets current texture matrix.

Parameters:
t - pointer to new texture matrix.

void SetView (  Matrix4fx *  v  ) 
 

Sets camera view matrix for current viewport.

Parameters:
v - pointer to new camera view matrix.

void SetViewport (  Int  x,
Int  y,
Int  width,
Int  height
) 
 

Sets current viewport position and size.

Parameters:
x - define x top left position of viewport on display.
y - define y top left position of viewport on display.
width - define width dimension of viewport.
height - define height dimension of viewport. SetViewport() can be called only one per Flush() call.

void SetWorld (  Matrix4fx *  w  ) 
 

Sets world matrix for current viewport.

Parameters:
w - pointer to new world matrix.

void Show (   ) 
 

Copies backbuffer to video memory on display.

Only part of backbuffer defined by last call of SetViewport() will be copied.

void UpdateFog (   ) 
 

Updates fog.

Need to call one time after all calls of SetFogColor(), SetFogMode(), SetFogDensity(), SetFogStart(), SetFogEnd().

void UpdateResources (   ) 
 

Releases all unreferenced resources.

Call this after releasing references to Texture or LightMap objects.
